item.name: Matchbook
item.description: You notice a small matchbook on the ground, it is red and black with light grazing on it from some use and look inside. Only a couple of matches left. Two have been used. You remember witnesses say they noticed a burning cigar near the body of the sheriff's wife. -Take the matchbook, keeping it for backing the witness testimony. -Discard the burnt matches and take the good ones.
